QuestData.Title: Mouths to Feed
QuestData.Description: We have rescued many refugees, as you can see. Unfortunately this has revealed a new problem.$b$bThe arcan'dor fruit is our salvation, but it does not bear enough fruit right now to cure everyone. We must rely on mana a little longer to tide the refugees over.$b$bValtrois thinks that she may have a solution. Please go speak with her and see what she plans to do.
QuestData.AreaDescription: Speak with Arcanist Valtrois in Shal'Aran.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Arcanist Valtrois in Shal'Aran.
QuestData.RewardText: It is good to see you. I could use a helping hand.
